# Exploración de datos

```{r}
social_networks_data <- read.csv("./social-network-data.csv")
social_networks_data <- social_networks_data[, -c(1)]
```

```{r}
ages_frecuency <- table(social_networks_data$Edad)
barplot(ages_frecuency)
```
